PHRASE.LANG:
The Hot Zone is a smokin' space that serves as a hub for all three Midway mini-game collections and hosts a bunch of Hot Streak Air Hockey tables (2-player real-time games). You will also find a Tele-Port-A-Potty leading to Darla's Den, a Mass Media Store ticket booth, and the Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. We will also be introducing games behind the Speed Dial teleporter for your continued pleasure.

THE ECONOMY
The Hot Zone uses Green Tickets as money. The player can collect Hot Zone Points by playing Hot Zone games and then redeem them for reward items from the Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. 

THE LOTS O' JUNK REDEMPTION CENTER
Select an item and redeem your accumulated Hot Zone Points to get the reward. We will continue to add new items and replace old items over time, so keep coming back for more!

The Hot Zone est un espace génial rassemblant les trois compilations de mini-jeux Midway. Tu y trouveras plein de tables Hot Streak Air Hockey pour deux joueurs (parties en temps réel). Il y a aussi un Tele-Port-A-Potty menant à Darla's Den, un guichet Mass Media et le Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. D'autres jeux seront également intégrés derrière le téléporteur Speed Dial. Tu ne risques pas de t'ennuyer ! 

L'ARGENT Dans The Hot Zone, les Green Tickets constituent la monnaie d'échange. Le joueur peut accumuler des points Hot Zone en jouant à des jeux Hot Zone, puis les échanger contre des récompenses du Lots O' Junk Redemption Center.

THE LOTS O' JUNK REDEMPTION CENTER Sélectionne un objet et utilise tes points Hot Zone pour l'obtenir. Nous ajouterons d'autres objets et remplacerons les anciens régulièrement, alors reviens souvent !

The Hot Zone ist ein echt heißer Bereich, der als Dreh- und Angelpunkt für alle drei Midway-Minispielsammlungen dient und in dem mehrere Hot Streak Air Hockey-Tische (Echtzeitspiele für je zwei Spieler) bereitstehen. Dort befinden sich auch ein Tele-Port-A-Potty, das zu Darla's Den führt, ein Mass Media-Ticketschalter und das Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. Und damit für noch mehr Entertainment gesorgt ist, gibt es sogar Spiele hinter dem Speed Dial-Teleporter.

WÄHRUNG The Hot Zone verwendet Green Tickets als Geld. Spieler können in den Hot Zone-Games Hot Zone-Punkte sammeln und sie dann gegen Prämien aus dem Lots O' Junk Redemption Center einlösen.

THE LOTS O' JUNK REDEMPTION CENTER Wähl ein Objekt aus und lös die gesammelten Hot Zone-Punkte gegen die Prämie ein. Wir fügen regelmäßig neue Objekte hinzu und ersetzen alte – sieh also immer mal wieder vorbei!

The Hot Zone è uno spazio che funge da anticamera alle tre raccolte di minigiochi Midway e include alcuni tavoli Hot Streak Air Hockey (giochi in tempo reale per due giocatori). Troverai anche un Tele-Port-A-Potty che conduce a Darla's Den, un botteghino Mass Media Store e il Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. Saranno aggiunti anche altri giochi nel teletrasportatore Speed Dial per un intrattenimento senza fine.

L'ECONOMIA The Hot Zone utilizza Green Tickets come moneta. Il giocatore accumula punti Hot Zone nei giochi Hot Zone e poi li utilizza per richiedere articoli premio presso il Lots O' Junk Redemption Center.

THE LOTS O' JUNK REDEMPTION CENTER Seleziona un articolo e riscatta i punti Hot Zone accumulati per ottenere il premio. Continueremo ad aggiungere nuovi articoli sostituendo quelli precedenti nel corso del tempo, quindi torna per scoprire altre novità!

The Hot Zone es el lugar de moda donde encontrarás las tres colecciones de minijuegos Midway, así como un montón de mesas Hot Streak Air Hockey (para 2 jugadores en tiempo real). También encontrarás un Tele-Port-A-Potty que lleva a Darla's Den, una taquilla de la tienda Mass Media y el Lots O' Junk Redemption Center. Además, añadiremos juegos detrás del teleportador Speed Dial para que sigas pasándolo en grande.

THE ECONOMY The Hot Zone utiliza Green Tickets como moneda. El jugador puede participar en los juegos Hot Zone para recoger puntos Hot Zone y, a continuación, canjearlos por objetos de recompensa en Lots O' Junk Redemption Center.

THE LOTS O' JUNK REDEMPTION CENTER Selecciona un artículo y canjea los puntos Hot Zone que hayas acumulado por tu recompensa. A medida que pase el tiempo iremos añadiendo nuevos objetos y retirando los antiguos, así que recuerda visitarnos con frecuencia.

ホットゾーン
 ホットゾーンは2人プレイ対戦専用Hot Streak Air Hockey、ダーラの部屋へのテレポートマシーン、チケットブースやホットゾーンポイント交換所などがあるラウンジです。無限に楽しむために、ここから各アメリカン・カーニバルラウンジへアクセスが可能です。
 
 ホットゾーンポイント
 ホットゾーンでプレイするためにはグリーンチケットが必要です。Hot Streak Air Hockeyではグリーンチケット3プレイ分を消費して、プレイ内容によってホットゾーンポイントを獲得できます。ホットゾーンポイントはホットゾーンポイント交換所でホームリワードと交換できます。
 
 ホットゾーンポイント交換所
 貯めたホットゾーンポイントを消費して交換したいホームリワードを選択しましょう。今後の更新でアイテム入れ変わることがありますので、何回か訪ねてみてください！

핫존은 Midway 게임 3종 콜렉션의 본거지 역할을 하며, 또한 여러대의 Hot Streak Air Hockey 테이블(2인용 리얼타임 게임)을 운영하는 끝내주는 스페이스입니다. 여러분은 이 곳에서 매스미디어 상점 티켓 부스, 고철 덩어리 교환 센터, 달라의 집으로 향하는 텔레포트 변기를 사용할 수 있습니다. 그리고 여러분의 만족을 위하여, 저희는 계속해서 Speed Dial 게임을 소개할 것입니다.

지불 방법
핫존은 티켓을 현금 대신 사용합니다. Hot Streak Air Hockey 테이블은 게임당 3장의 티켓을 지불하며 핫존 포인트를 획득할 수 있습니다. 플레이어는 핫존 게임을 플레이하며 핫존 포인트를 획득할 수 있으며, 이 포인트는 포인트 교환 센터에서 리워드로 교환할 수 있습니다.

고철 덩어리 교환 센터
아이템을 선택하고 여러분이 모은 핫존 포인트를 리워드와 교환하세요. 저희는 지속적으로 오래된 아이템을 새로운 아이템으로 교환할 예정이니 계속 방문해 주세요!

HOT ZONE
Hot Zone是所有三個的Midway大廳迷你遊戲集合中心，並且設有許多Hot Streak Air Hockey遊戲桌(2人即時對戰遊戲)。您也可以發現可前往達拉之家的傳送站、Mass Media售票處、以及一個大量廢物兌換中心。我們同時也以快速傳送讓您盡情遊玩遊戲。

消費方式
玩家遊玩Hot Zone遊戲收集Hot Zone積分便可以在大量廢物兌換中心兌換獎品道具。

大量廢物兌換中心
選擇道具並以您累積的Hot Zone積分來獲得獎品道具。我們會持續追加新道具以取代舊道具，所以您一定要常常回來確認！

We are delighted to introduce an exciting sweepstakes opportunity! Every time you use your Green Ticket to play any game in any Midway space or the Hot Zone, you will get a sweepstakes entry! There are 25 fabulous Sony prizes and a pile of money to give away too! Check out the Sweepstakes Prizes Board to see what you can win. Just read the Official Rules and, if you qualify, sign up for the Sweepstakes and start playing for fun and a chance to win real prizes! Once you enter the sweepstakes you can track your entries on the My Sweepstakes Entries Board. Have a ton of fun and good luck!


OFFICIAL RULES

NO PURCHASE NECESSARY TO ENTER OR WIN. A PURCHASE DOES NOT IMPROVE YOUR CHANCES OF WINNING.

Entrants should look solely to Sponsor with any questions, comments or problems related to the Promotion.

1. ELIGIBILITY: The Midway’s Cash Carnival Prize (the “Promotion”) is open only to legal residents of the 50 United States and the District of Columbia who are 18 years of age or older. Entrants under the legal age of majority in their state of residence should get permission to enter the Promotion from their parent or guardian. Employees of Sponsor and its parent companies, affiliates, subsidiaries, and related companies, and agencies and immediate families (defined as parents, children, siblings and spouse and their respective spouses, regardless of where they reside) and those living in the same household, whether or not related, are not eligible to enter or win. Void in all U.S. territories and possessions and overseas military installations and where prohibited or restricted by law

3. HOW TO ENTER: 
i. Enter through PlayStation®Home:
1) During the Promotion Period, log into your PlayStation®Network account and launch PlayStation®Home application.
2) Make your way to the Midway section of PlayStation®Home.
3) Play any of the games located in the Midway section. To play any of the games located in the Midway, you will need a ticket. You can purchase 50 tickets for $0.99. Free-play games do not count as an entry into the Promotion.
4) For Week 1 through Week 25’s drawings, one ticket will count as one entry into the Promotion for that week. You must play one of the games in Midway to enter that week’s drawing. You may play any of the Midway games multiple times to submit multiple entries. There is no limit on the number of entries that you can submit.
5) To be entered into the Grand Prize drawing, you will get one entry for every one entry entered into the Promotion from Week 1 through Week 25’s drawings. For example, if you have one entry in Week One and one entry in Week Two, you will get two entries into the Grand Prize drawing. If your entry is chosen as a winning entry during one of the weekly drawings, that winning entry will be considered an eligible entry for the Grand Prize drawing.
6) You may play any of the Midway games multiple times to submit multiple entries. There is no limit on the number of entries you can submit.
7) The Sponsor will randomly draw a winner for each week.
ii. Enter by Mail:
1) During the Promotion Period, handwrite your name, email address, and indicate which week’s promotion drawing you would like to be entered into on a postage paid postcard via US Postal Service mail to The Midway’s Cash Carnival Prize, 530 Los Angeles Avenue #115 Box 218 Moorpark, CA 93021. 
2) For Week 1 through Week 25’s drawings, one mail in entry will count as one entry into the Promotion for that week. There is no limit on the number of entries that you can submit. If your entry is chosen as a winning entry during one of the weekly drawings, that winning entry will be considered an eligible entry for the Grand Prize drawing.
3) To be qualified in each week’s promotion, mail-in entries must be received between the following dates:
